title: Font - Le hussard sur le toit
content:
Hi everybody,

Please does anyone know the name of the typefaces used on this poster of the french movie "Le hussard sur le toit" ?

I will be grateful for any help you can provide,

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MovieCovers-119537-224450-LE%20HUSSARD%20SUR%20LE%20TOIT_4686.jpg)

Font: 

 OCR-B, Bodoni 

Solved By: 

 [Michel Boyer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854/http:/typophile.com/user/18942 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
Please try and crop your image. It's really difficult to see the letters together.  
Don
Thank you for having resized the picture. Nobody knows about the font ?

HUSSARD Didot many sellers, including Linotype [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/didot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/didot/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/didot/")  
No surprise at the choice of this font for a French Movie.  
Don

As for the sans, the match should be easy but I didn't see it. I ran across problems similar to those encountered in [http://typophile.com/node/115128](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854/http:/typophile.com/node/115128 "http://typophile.com/node/115128"). The serifed I on a sans font is relatively rare. The following fonts have it, together with a matching G: Lettera, FF Fago, Elsa, ITC Officina Sans, Droid Sans, FF Info, FS Albert, Ubik, and FS Me. However every one of these fonts has mismatches for other letters. Perhaps the closest of this lot is FS Me [http://www.identifont.com/find?font=FS+Me&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=FS+Me&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?font=FS+Me&q=Go") It's the only one with the right style of Q.  
Anyone else prepared to take a stab at this?  
Don

The sans looks like OCR B

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ocr-b_4053.png)

And the words "SUR" and "TOIT" could also be Bodoni  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sur-toit_4168.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bodoni_6662.png)

Congratulations Michael! I can find no letter conflicts between the poster and OCR B. Nor, for that matter, between it and Bodoni.  
Don

I could find no exact match for HUSSARD, in particular because of the S lower serif

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717204854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s-serif_4012.png)
Don't worry about this font. Il will use the Bodoni. Thank you all.
